headline.main: Panel Urges a National Drive on Heart Disease as Only Hope of Cutting Toll

docs.abstract: Rept sponsored by Natl Heart and Lung Inst holds Amers could reduce their risk of heart disease by giving up cigarette smoking

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr.Special to The New York Times

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 9 -- A Government-sponsored panel recommended today a large-scale national attack on heart disease as the only hope of stemming the present epidemic scope of its toll.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 9 -- A Government-sponsored panel recommended today a large-scale national attack on heart disease as the only hope of stemming the present epidemic scope of its toll.
